mapper.select: SELECT distinct institution.ins_id, institution.ins_name, -- institution.user_id, -- institution.ins_principal_name, -- institution.ins_principal_phone, institution.ins_type, institution.address_id, institution.ins_fax, institution.ins_land_line_phone, institution.ins_remark, CASE WHEN institution_associate.associate_status IS NULL THEN - 1 ELSE institution_associate.associate_status END associate_status FROM p10_institution institution LEFT JOIN p10_institution_associate institution_associate ON institution.ins_id = institution_associate.ins_associate_id AND institution_associate.ins_id = #{insId} WHERE institution.del_flag = '0' AND institution.ins_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{insName},'%') AND institution.ins_id != #{insId} AND ins_type != 1000 LIMIT 15

SELECT `institution`.ins_id, `institution`.ins_name, -- `institution`.ins_principal_name, -- `institution`.ins_principal_phone, `institution`.ins_type, `institution`.address_id, `institution`.ins_fax, `institution`.ins_land_line_phone, `institution`.ins_remark, `institution`.create_time, `institution`.update_time, `institution`.del_flag FROM p10_institution institution
`institution`.del_flag = '0'
and `institution`.ins_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.insName},'%')
and `institution`.ins_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.insType},'%')
ORDER BY `institution`.create_time DESC

SELECT `institution`.ins_id, `institution`.ins_name, -- `institution`.ins_principal_name, -- `institution`.ins_principal_phone, `institution`.ins_type, `institution`.address_id, `institution`.ins_fax, `institution`.ins_land_line_phone, `institution`.ins_remark, `institution`.create_time, `institution`.update_time, `institution`.del_flag FROM p10_institution institution WHERE `institution`.del_flag = '0' AND `institution`.ins_id = #{insId}

select * from p10_institution left join p10_address on p10_address.address_id = p10_institution.address_id and p10_address.type = 1 where p10_institution.del_flag = 0
and p10_institution.ins_name like concat('%', #{query.insName}, '%')
and p10_institution.ins_type like concat('%', #{query.insType}, '%')
